turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, which starbucks would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: At the corner of 544 and Murphy street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to place the order now, or later?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What item would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A mocha frappuccino with whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, your order is a venti mocha frappuccino with 2% milk and whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sending the order in now. How would you like to be notified when the order is ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, I will text you the time when your order is ready for pick-up. I will also text and email a copy of the receipt.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. Would you like to continue with any other tasks.
